name: HyperJumper
description:
Run through high rise buildings!!

■Rules
Jump from building to building!
Game over when you fall from a building or crash into a crow.
Challenge how long you can keep playing.
Sometimes a balloon pop up on the screen and if you hold onto it......?

■Compatible with game center
Compete against players from all around the world!!
Get high points by running through rear buildings!!

■Operation
JUMP button: Jump
MOVE button: Move back and forth between front and rear buildings
PAUSE button: Pause
